content:
in a statement released Monday the Big Ten Conference announced its decision to continue the suspension of all organized team activities until June  PERIOD

It cites the suspension as an additional measure to the cancellations and moratoriums already in place while the conference will continue to work with medical experts and institutional leadership on coronavirusrelated issues to ensure the safety of everyone involved PERIOD

The suspension will be reevaluated on June  PERIOD

This is the second time the suspension has been extended PERIOD
